docs.snippet: BILLS REPORTED FAVORABLY.  Making appropriations for the payment of the direct tax due by the State to the General Government Amending the charter of the Long Island Railroad.

headline.main: PROCEEDING OF THE LEGISLATURE; SENATE. BILLS INTRODUCED. ASSEMBLY. BILLS REPORTED FAVORABLY. BILLS PASSED. EVENING SESSION.

headline.main: An English Ship Boarded by the Sumter.

docs.snippet: In the Senate, yesterday, a favorable report was made on the bill making appropriations for the  payment of the direct tax due from the State to the General Government; also on the bill for repairing tho Brooklyn Arsenal, and erecting an arsenal at...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate, yesterday, a favorable report was made on the bill making appropriations for the payment of the direct tax due from the State to the General Government; also on the bill for repairing tho Brooklyn Arsenal, and erecting an arsenal at Rochester and a magazine at Buffalo; also on the Assembly bill to close up the Canal Enlargement. A number of bills were introduced, but mainly of local interest.

docs.snippet: -A  CHANCE FOR THE CHARITABLE. The heroism and the triumphs of the National soldiers in North Carolina have already been fully chronicled by the Press; and Roanoke and Newbern among battles, and Gen. BURNSIDE among commanders, and the Eastern troops...
docs.lead_paragraph: -A CHANCE FOR THE CHARITABLE. The heroism and the triumphs of the National soldiers in North Carolina have already been fully chronicled by the Press; and Roanoke and Newbern among battles, and Gen. BURNSIDE among commanders, and the Eastern troops among soldiers, now stand in the foremost rank in the mind of the nation.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: U.S. steam transport George Peabody, Capt. TRAVERS, from Newbern, N.C., March 22, in ballast, to the U.S. Quartermaster, arrived at this port yesterday. She left in company with the steamer NewBrunswick for New-York, and passed over the Swash on...

headline.main: GEN. BURNSIDE'S OPERATIONS.; Arrival of the Transports George Peabody and New-Brunswick. THE EXPEDITION AGAINST BEAUFORT. The Rebel Steamer Nashville Not Burnt, but Captured by Our Forces. WOUNDED SOLDIERS BROUGHT TO NEW-YORK.

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. steam transport George Peabody, Capt. TRAVERS, from Newbern, N.C., March 22, in ballast, to the U.S. Quartermaster, arrived at this port yesterday. She left in company with the steamer NewBrunswick for New-York, and passed over the Swash on Sunday, at 11 A.M. Found at the Inlet the steamer Port Royal, from New-York, all well.

docs.snippet: By the arrival of the steamship Nova Scotian at Portland, we have advices from Europe two days later than were received by the Hansa. There is little news of interest.
docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the steamship Nova Scotian at Portland, we have advices from Europe two days later than were received by the Hansa. There is little news of interest.

docs.snippet: The bill incorporating the New-York Homoeopathic Medical Society was reported favorably, and ordered to a third reading.

headline.main: PROCEEDINGS OF THE LEGISLATURE.; SENATE. BILLS PASSED. EVENING SESSION.

docs.lead_paragraph: The bill incorporating the New-York Homoeopathic Medical Society was reported favorably, and ordered to a third reading.
